view.main

Class TopPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.util.GenericPane<javafx.scene.layout.StackPane>
      • view.main.TopPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>, ProgressSpinnerCallbacks

    public class TopPane
extends GenericPane<javafx.scene.layout.StackPane>
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>, ProgressSpinnerCallbacks
    Creates a pane that runs horizontal along the windows north border and displays the users name along with the logout button.
    Version:
    11-11-2013
    Author:
    Mohammad Juma, Tim Mikeladze
